title: Massage Parlor Prostitutes
overview: An erotic film about the relationship between a top masseuse and a newcomer at a massage parlor. Min-seo, the star masseuse at a massage parlor, learns from the manager that a new masseuse will be joining them. When the newbie, Ye-joo, begins stealing her regular clients, Min-seo grows anxious as her position as the ace is threatened. Meanwhile, as Ye-joo quickly climbs the ranks to rival Min-seo’s status, she becomes increasingly frustrated by Min-seo’s unusually hostile attitude toward her. Eventually, Ye-joo urges the manager to fire Min-seo, but he refuses, unable to let go of someone he’s grown fond of. Undeterred, Ye-joo devises a plan to seduce a client into getting rid of Min-seo.
